title: GENERAL
fullText:
Body-protected electrical areas shall be identified with the sign shown in Figure 15. Cardiac-protected electrical areas shall be identified with the sign shown in Figure 16.
The signs shall be 200 mm (horizontal) Ã— 90 mm (vertical) in size, with a tolerance of +5%
0%.
The lettering and symbol shall be white, printed on a green background (refer to AS 1319). Any superseded labels shall be removed from the sign.
